-c.Description: Container name; defaults to first container

--container=''.Description: Container name; defaults to first container

-f.Description: to use to rsh into the resource

--filename=[].Description: to use to rsh into the resource

--pod-running-timeout=1m0s.Description: The length of time (like 5s, 2m, or 3h, higher than zero) to wait until at least one pod is running

-t.Description: Force a pseudo-terminal to be allocated

--tty=false.Description: Force a pseudo-terminal to be allocated
